markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Snare Setter](/Feats.aspx?ID=5617) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=759" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 22 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=37)

</column>

---

You are adept at the time-honored kobold art of making traps. You gain the trained proficiency in Crafting. If you were already trained in Crafting, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You gain access to all uncommon [kobold](/Traits.aspx?ID=759) [snares](/Traits.aspx?ID=146). You gain the [Snare Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=843) feat, though when choosing your formulas for that feat, you can also choose from uncommon kobold snares, as well as common snares.
name: Snare Setter

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 1" pfs="Standard" > Snare Setter Source Player Core 2 pg. 22 1.1 Prerequisites Trained in Crafting --- You are adept at the time-honored kobold art of making traps. You gain the trained proficiency in Crafting. If you were already trained in Crafting, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You gain access to all uncommon kobold snares. You gain the Snare Crafting feat, though when choosing your formulas for that feat, you can also choose from uncommon kobold snares, as well as common snares.
